reviews.review:
Apart from Salty Reviews/Comments from Survivors. This game is Amazing, especially with friends. However you can't be the killer and have your friend be the survivor WITH randoms, probably for reasons that stop XP grinding, which is fair enough.
Being survivor is thrilling and really funny if your in a call with other people in a custom match.
The leveling system is fair and balanced, however some killers are more powerful than others, especially with ultra rare addons.
I've enjoy this game a lot and it's always a good option that I keep open when my mates and I are choosing a game.
a pretty good job so far

매튜 생각이 있는거냐! 랜뽑한테 패널티를 줘야지.. 랜뽑= 자살추

nice and fun game to play with your friends, nice to play alone as a killer
cool game but its not scary anymore but still cool :^)
totally caught me off guard this game. Really fun to play with family and friends. :)
A really great game to invest in, i played 6 months for now and hvnt regret it

I love this game, there's nothing else really like it. Different killers make the game challenging and playing with friends is always a good time.
i shid my panties bro the fuck

with playing this game for 40 hours, i think i can write a comfortable review.. its easy to learn, but hard to master. Dont worry getting matched with super high ranked people because the matchmaking system only matches people close to your rank. the toxicity is not a problem at all, despite what other people say. you may get your occasional tryhard killer, or teammate that quites 5 minutes into the game, but thats once in a blue moon.. this game is supper addicting and with only owning this game for a couple of days, i think its safe to say im hooked. definitely recommend if you you enjoy horror survival games such as Friday The 13th
Great game, the developers constantly support it with new killers and survivors priced very reasonably. Highly recommended.
muy buen juego multijugador aunque la comunidad a veces no ayuda a su equipó, es preferible jugar con amigos para pasar un buen rato: 8/10
Um ótimo jogo para quem procura uma diversão casual, sem o stress, partidas rápidas e tranquilas!

É um jogo realmente bom, nunca enjoei, e sempre trazem coisas novas para evitar de saturar sempre os mesmos assassinos e sobreviventes. E se o assassino for o Leatherface, já desista de início, ele é o capeta!
This game is awesome, I just wish I had friends to play it with.
I was iffy at first, but this is now one of my favorite games. It's nearly addicting. I would 100% recommend it. 10/10
Можно поиграть пару тройку тысяч часов.

Игра богов 
Советую всем, в неё сыграть

Excelente game! Principalmente quando se joga de SURVIVOR, pois você sente na própria pele a emoção e tensão de fugir de um assassino sanguinário que está a sua volta.

O jogo se resume em 4 SURVIVOR's VS 1 ASSASSINO(KILLER), o objetivo dos sobreviventes são ligar os geradores que se encontram espalhados pelo mapa, os geradores são essenciais para se concluir o objetivo, pois sem eles ativo, é impossível ligar a porta principal para fugir do assassino. Enquanto os sobreviventes estão em busca de conseguirem ligarem os geradores, o Assassino os persegue nesse trajeto em buscar de conseguir elimina-los os pendurando em ganchos que por sua vez auxiliam o assassino a matar os sobreviventes.

Existe também um sistema de PERKS interessante.

 Em si, é um jogo muito bom para se passar o tempo! NOTA 9/10
nawet spoko ale jak sie nie ma nerwow to lepiej nie grac
Отличная игра, мне лично не к чему придраться!
Bardzo fajna gra. Najprzyjemniej jak dla mnie się gra killerem ale to już moja osobista opinia. Daje dużo frajdy i satysfakcji jak uda ci się uciec przed zabójcą albo zabijesz wszystkich.
Why am I addicted to this extremely toxic game? Still have yet to figure that out, maybe at 1,000 hours I'll know.

I find it a really fun game with everyone it's more fun to play with people than rather yourself because you can do some stupid stuff with your friends. I'd recommend it to people who love to get in chases and love to get scared by a Michael or Ghost face.

Um jogo extremamente difícil, que requer muito treino e estudo pra virar um ótimo jogador.
E esse jogo é o Smash Bros do terror.

addictive game but you get bored from it and the cycle goes on :-)
The game is always changing, always improving.

It's the one game I always go back to.  I'm not a super big fan of shooters, so this game really suits me. Also it's not pay to win, which is really nice. The grind is super long though if you want to unlock everything for every character.
Also there is usually at least 1 big bug in the game, but it usually doesn't effect gameplay too much.
An awesome game to play with yours friends.
This is by far one of the most addicting games I have played in the past year and I have no idea why.

К большому сожалению игра скатилась !  мне очень жаль это писать но по всей видимости разрабам стало на столько похер на эту  игру что они совсем не слушают предложения игроков,за последние время поиск игры ,хиты и хитбоксы в игре совсем ведут  себя странно и не только это ! если раньше любой сурв мог хоть как то избавиться от погони то теперь все абузы и неплохие спавны  убрали !!!!!! что очень сильно упрощает поимку манам ! такой дизбаланс убивает эту игру !!!! очень жаль !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! хотя с этой игрой было много приятных воспоминаний (!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Bom jogo, só falta servidor dedicado pra melhorar
